K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-0: bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du 'khor los sgyur ba yongs @282b su ma bzung ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-1: zhes nas de 'di skad ces zer te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-2: su ci 'dod pa de khyed la byin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-7: nang gi gzugs la'ang don du gnyer ba med na; gzhan la lta ci smos te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-9: ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-11: 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-13: de snying brtse bas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byas shing snying rje chen pos sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang sems can gang yongs su grub pa de lta bu mi dmigs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-16: ming dang brda'i tha snyad kyis rnam par spyod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-17: rnam par spyod pa de'ang sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par spyad du med par shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-20: spyod pa'i tshe ci nas kyang bdag gi sha yan chad byang sems can rnams la yongs su ma btang ba med par byed na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:282b-21: phyi rol gyi yo byad gang gi sems can rnams 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya ba dag lta smos su'ang med pa de ltar spyad par bya'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283a-33: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283a-35: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283a-36: yo byad do; ;dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283a-38: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283a-53: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283b-2: rnam par thar pa rnams ni /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283b-6: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283b-20: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:283b-26: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:284a-5: rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:284a-7: de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di skad ces zer te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:284a-9: rigs kyi bu dag tshul khrims srungs shig /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:284a-33: khyed gang gis phongs pa'i phyir tshul khrims ngan pa la spyod par gyur pa'i yo byad dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:284b-3: rim gyis theg pa gsum pos yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-4: gnod sems med par gyis shig ces bya'o //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-9: de la dngos po gang yang med do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-13: gnod sems su byed par gyur pa'ang de ltar 'thabs shing 'khon te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-14: gnod sems su gyur nas dbyig pas 'gyed pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-16: phan tshun gyi srog la rgal bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-17: de lta yin yang khyed yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas 'khrugs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-18: sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-19: byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-20: gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-21: de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu'ang khyed sdug bsngal mi bzod pa tsha zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285a-22: skyes bu khyed rnams dngos po med pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas mir skye ba'ang 'thob par mi 'gyur na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285b-0: sangs @285b rgyas byung ba dang phrad par gyur pa lta smos su'ang med pa de lta bu'i las yongs su ma 'dzin cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285b-6: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285b-11: dal ba 'di don med par ma bya zhig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285b-12: mi khom par gyur cing gsor mi rung bar gyur ta [*te?] re zhes de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang bzod pa sgrub la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:285b-13: gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par skul lo //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-0: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus @286a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-1: chung ba dag mthong na 'di skad du /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-2: khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces brjod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-3: de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-5: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-10: gzhan yang rnam pa gang dang gang gis brtson 'grus brtsam du rung ba de dag khyed la ngas nye bar bsgrub par bya'i /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-11: brtson 'grus rtsoms shig ces nas sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i yo byad la spyod cing lus sam sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-12: de dag lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-13: dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-14: de dag bsgoms pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-15: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286a-20: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang brtson 'grus rtsam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286b-0: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par @286b skul lo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286b-1: brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286b-2: sems can gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286b-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag rgya pa //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:286b-7: bam po nyis brgya go gnyis pa //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:299b-9: gzhan lta la ci smos te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:299b-10: gzhan du na ngas sems can rnams kyi don du 'khor ba yongs su bzung gi /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:302a-22: gcugs gang gis khyed kyi khro ba skye bar gyur pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:302a-24: de la dngos po gang yang med do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:302a-31: phan tshun gyi srog la rgal bar gyur pa'i dngos po de la dngos po'i rang bzhin gang yang med na /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:302a-33: sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:302a-34: byol song gi skye gnas dag tu ltung bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:302a-35: gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu ltung bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:302b-0: de ma yin pa'i ngan song gzhan dag tu'ang khyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong @302b bar 'gyur gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:302b-1: skyes bu khyed rnams dngos por med pa'i chos kyi don du las gang yongs su bzung bas mir skye ba'ang thob par mi 'gyur na /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:303a-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba dag mthong na 'di skad du /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:303a-2: khyed ci'i phyir le lo byed ces brjod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:303a-3: de dag rkyen dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:303a-5: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can de dag la 'di skad ces zer te /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:303a-14: dge ba'i chos de dag gis 'phags pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:303a-15: de dag bsgoms pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:303a-16: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob bo //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-0: bya ba ma yin pa'i lta bar ltung ba'i @368a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-4: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod ces bya ba'i gnas med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-7: gal te de ltar nges pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-8: tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i gnas su mi skye ba lags na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-9: gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang byol song gi rgyud du skyes pa'i rabs bstan na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-10: de'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du mchis /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-14: mi dge ba'i las kyis byol song gi rgyud du skye ba ma yin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-15: lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing sems can rnams kyi don du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368a-17: de ltar thabs mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byol song gi skye gnas su skyes shing de la la la zhig gsod du 'ongs kyang bla na med pa'i bzod pas bdag yongs su gtong zhing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-0: sems can de dag la gnod par mi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa dag dgra bcom @368b pa'am; rang sangs rgyas dag la yod dam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-3: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-4: sems can rnams kyi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-5: byol song gi skye gnas su skye'ang byol song gi skye gnas kyi rgyud kyi nyes pas mi gos par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-8: dge ba'i chos gang la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba'i dge ba'i chos de lta bu gang zhig yod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-12: de dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-13: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du dge ba'i chos gang yang yongs su rdzogs par mi bya ba med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:368b-14: dge ba'i chos gang yongs su rdzogs par ma byas par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems dang po bskyed pa nas @369a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-1: nye bar bzung ste dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la bslab par bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-4: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyang yongs su spong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos dkar po zag pa ma mchis pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ngan song ngam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-9: byol song gi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa zag pa med pa yin nam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-17: de de lags te /de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-18: 'phags shing zag pa mi mnga' ba'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-21: de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags mngon par sprul pa mdzad cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-22: de mngon par sprul nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad pa de lta bu yod dam med /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369a-27: des de bzhin gshegs pa byol song gi skye gnas par 'gyur ram /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @369b pa; rab 'byor /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-1: de bzhin gshegs pas byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ram /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-7: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa'ang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te; lus de dag gis sems can rnams ci rigs ci tshul du yongs su smin par byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-10: dgra bcom pas sprul pa mngon par sprul na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-11: sprul pa des dgra bcom pa'i las byas shing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-12: las des gzhan gyi dge ba skye bar 'gyur ba yod dam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-19: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa'ang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te ci rigs ci tshul du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-20: de lta bu'i lus des sdug bsngal du'ang mi 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-21: sdug bsngal gyi tshor pa'ang nyams su mi myong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-22: rab 'byor; de ji snyam du sems /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-23: sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma las glang po'i gzugs sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:369b-25: glang gi gzugs shig bstan tam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-0: gzhan yang sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs @370a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-2: de dag glang po'i gzugs sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-5: srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag tu'ang 'gyur ba yod dam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-11: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos zag pa med pa dang ldan pa'ang ched du bsams shing de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-12: lus de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-13: sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do; ;rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-15: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i ye shes zag pa ma mchis pa dang de ltar ldan zhing lus gang dang gang gis sems can rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba de dang de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-16: thabs shin tu mkhas pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po gang dang gang la gnas shing de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa bgyid kyang las de lta bus mi gos par spyod pa lags /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-0: @370b thabs mkhas pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed kyang des de la gang yang reg par 'gyur ba med do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-2: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang reg par byed pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-3: gang gis reg par bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-4: gang la reg par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gsum po de dag thams cad mi dmigs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-7: 'di ltar chos gsum po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-9: stong pa nyid la reg par mi byed do; ;stong pa nyid kyis chos gang la'ang reg par mi 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-10: stong pa nyid kyang reg par bya ba ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-13: 'di ltar stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid mi dmigs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-14: de ni; mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-15: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gzhan la mi gnas kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig la gnas shing rnam pa de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod pa lags sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:370b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-0: chos gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su ma chud pa de lta bu yod @371a *//

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-4: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khongs su chos thams cad 'du ba lags /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-7: chos gang yang khongs su chud pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-8: khongs su ma chud pa zhes bgyi ba ma mchis so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-11: chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis mi stong ngam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-17: de ste chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-18: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du ma 'dus sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-25: khyod kyis 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing de lta bu'i thabs mkhas pa la spyod par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371a-27: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-0: mngon par shes pa gang la gnas shing phyogs bcu'i phyogs re @371b re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchi ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-7: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong par mthong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-9: gzhan du na ming dang brdar gdags pa nye bar bzung zhing bstan pa ma gtogs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-10: gdags pa kun kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-13: gdags pa'i rgyud de dag kyang ngo bo nyid kyis mi stong pa zhig yin na ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:371b-14: nyi tshe ba'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-5: mngon par shes pa de dag la gnas shing lha'i mig dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-10: 'chi 'pho shes pa mngon par sgrub ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-11: mngon par shes pa med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-13: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-14: mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'dus pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-15: mngon par shes pa de dag las byang chub yongs su btsal bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-16: de tshol ba'i tshe lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas bdag nyid kyis kyang dge ba'i chos thams cad mthong /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-17: gzhan yang dge ba'i chos thams cad la sbyor te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-18: dge ba'i chos de dag la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-20: dge ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-21: ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372a-23: gang la mngon par zhen cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-0: ro myong bar byed par mngon @372b par zhen par 'gyur ba med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-2: ro myong bar byed pa med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-4: bam po nyis brgya go bdun pa //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-5: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-6: lha'i mig des chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mthong ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-7: de chos de dag la gnas shing las mngon par sgrub bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-8: las mngon par sgrub pa des sems can rnams la chos ston te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-9: sems can nam sems can du gdags par dmigs pa med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-10: de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-11: mngon par shes pa de dag gis mngon par shes par bya ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-12: de lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pa de nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mthong ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-13: de de dag tu rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing sbyin pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-19: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-20: yang dag par spong ba rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-21: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-24: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:372b-25: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-1: par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-6: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-7: rnam par thar pa rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-9: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam; mi 'jigs pa rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-11: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-16: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed cing sems can de dag gi bya ba byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-19: de la sems can ser sna can gang ji snyed pa de dag la 'di skad du chos ston cing sbyin pa byin cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:373a-23: bdag gi don kyang bya bar mi nus na /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:491b-19: chu ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do //

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492a-17: padma dkar po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i phang lo tsam ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492a-20: sngon po lta bur ston pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492a-24: ser po lta bur ston pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492a-28: dmar po lta bur ston pa /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492a-33: 'od dkar po 'byung ba dag yod do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-0: @492b rdzing bu de dag thams cad na ngang dur dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-3: bzhad sgra 'byin pa dag yod do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-4: skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing ris su bcad pa med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-5: 'di ltar sems can dag yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-7: grong khyer de dag gi dbus kyi gzhi mdo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-8: khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yod pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-9: rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-10: ra ba rim pa bdun dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-11: ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba zhig yod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-12: khang pa de na khang ba'i longs spyod du rtag tu rab dga' zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-13: mya ngan med ces bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-14: mya ngan bral zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-15: me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-16: skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-17: bzang mchog ces bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-18: dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-19: dga' mchog ces bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-20: bde ba zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-21: bde ldan zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-22: nges pa zhes bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-23: mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:492b-24: rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-5: ke ke ru la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-6: rdzing bu de dag re re la'ang them skas them pa rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-7: them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas kyang dzambu chu ba'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-8: rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-9: me tog ku mu da dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-11: padma dkar po sna tshogs kyis khebs shing ngang dur dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-14: rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug tu me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-15: shing de dag rlung gis bskyod pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-16: me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-17: rdzing bu de thams cad kyi chu'ang tsandan gyi drir phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-18: dri dang ldan no; ;de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-19: rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-20: grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-21: bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-22: rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-23: rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493a-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-1: de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-2: sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang gong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-5: shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-7: stan nang tshangs can bting ba /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-8: stan snying po can du byas pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-9: ka shi ka'i ras bting ba /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-10: 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-11: steng gi bar snang la ras kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres shing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-12: de ltar chos la gus par byed pas sa phyogs de khor yug kyang me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtor cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-13: sa phyogs de'ang spos sna tshogs dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-14: bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par byed de; de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-17: de ltar bur gus par byed cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-19: de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-20: mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-21: srog chags stong phrag mang po; srog chags 'bum phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:493b-28: tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-0: @494a *// sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-2: rigs kyi bu; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song zhig dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-3: de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-6: yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-9: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-10: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-12: des kyang sngon du da ltar khyod ji ltar 'tshol ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-14: khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed la rgyun ma bcad par song zhig dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-15: ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de thos nas dga' mgu yid rangs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-17: rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-18: yid bde ba skyes par gyur pas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-21: skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis phog na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-22: yid la byed pa gzhan mi bskyed kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494a-23: gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-0: zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed snyam sems pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems @494b dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par byed cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-1: chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-3: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes pa bskyed nas de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-4: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-5: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-6: chos thams cad mi shes pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-7: chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-8: chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-13: chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:494b-16: sems can thams cad kyi sgra bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-3: sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-7: ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-8: rang bzhin rnam par bltas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-9: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-10: rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-14: 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-16: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-17: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-18: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-19: gzugs kyi rdul sel ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495a-23: dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-0: sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge @495b 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-1: rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-2: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-3: padma bkod pa zhes bya ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-4: nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-5: snying po thams cad kyis rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-6: chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-9: mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-10: chos thams cad las nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-11: chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-12: chos thams cad bye brag med par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-13: lta bar gyur ba'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-14: mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-16: chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-17: le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-18: chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-19: ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-20: mi 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:495b-21: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-0: 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge @496a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-2: 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-4: de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-6: zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-9: nged kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-10: yongs su tshol ba na'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-11: ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-12: phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-13: nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-14: gang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-17: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rdzas su mi mthong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-0: chos @496b gang gis kyang rlom sems sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-1: rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-2: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-3: dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-5: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-6: sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-7: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-8: yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-9: yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad bzung ba'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-10: mtha' bstan par mi nus na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-12: rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-15: khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-16: 'dun pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste; rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-20: khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin du gus pa bskyed par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-22: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-23: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:496b-24: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-2: de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-4: khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-5: thabs la mkhas pa la bslab bo; ;rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-7: khyod yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-8: des khyod la ci bsgo ba bzhin du zungs shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-10: gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-14: de las lhag par yang mgo la thod bzhin du thogs shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-15: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-19: reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon pa ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-22: de'i mthus khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497a-24: thabs la mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @497b rtag tu ngu dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-1: rigs kyi bu de'ang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-2: langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-6: yang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-9: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-10: sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-12: bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-13: yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-14: bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-20: gus par bya ba nye bar gzhag ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-21: nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:497b-22: bdag gis ji lta bu'i bkur sti bya bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-0: dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags @498a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-1: la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-15: gdugs de lta bu'ang bdag la med na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-16: bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-17: bdag gis tshul ma yin pa byas par 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-22: bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar gyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-23: de'i grong bar gyi dbus su de 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-24: 'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-25: yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de btsongs la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-26: 'khor ba dpag tu med pa dag 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-27: 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498a-30: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus grong bar du 'dug ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-0: mi su nyo 'dod ces sgra bsgrags @498b shing skad kyis bos so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-1: de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-3: chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyad na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-5: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-6: thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-7: bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-8: yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-9: thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-10: der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-12: sems can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-13: bdag gis 'di la bar chad bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-14: snyam nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-15: khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mi su nyo 'dod /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-16: su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:498b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nye ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-1: btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-2: lus nyo ba'ang bdag gis ma rnyed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-4: rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed do; ;snyam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-5: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-6: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-7: chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis bag ma par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-9: lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i chad byad du mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-11: khyod 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi sa ma 'byung ba ci nyes /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-15: chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te chos la mchod pa bya bar 'dod na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-16: lus nyo ba de kho bos ma rnyed nas de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-18: bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499a-19: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya snyam na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-0: bdag gis lus nyo ba'ang ma @499b rnyed do; ;snyam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-1: de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-5: 'on kyang kho bo mchod sbyin zhig byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-9: rkang dag kho bo la dgos na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-10: de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-12: gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-15: rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-16: bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa rnams la yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-22: sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-24: kho bo'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-25: des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-27: khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-29: des de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-31: khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de kho bo la byin cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-32: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshan rnon po thogs nas lag pa g-yas pa phug ste khrag gzugs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:499b-33: brla g-yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-1: dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-2: rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-3: bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-4: snyam nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-5: khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-9: rtag tu ngus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-10: bram ze'i khye'u 'di la bcings te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-11: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-12: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-14: khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500a-17: rkang yang btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-0: gang la kho bos bslab par bya ba'i @500b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-1: thabs la mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-2: kho bos de la bslabs na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-4: lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu'ang thob par 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-5: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-13: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang thob par 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-15: mngon par shes pa drug dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-16: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-17: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-18: shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-21: gang gis sems can thams cad la kun du bgo bsha' bya ba'o bla na med pa'i chos rin po che'ang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-22: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:500b-24: khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-1: kyi bu; chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su btang bar bya ba yin na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-3: de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-5: khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gser ram /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-18: khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-19: bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-20: bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-21: de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-22: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501a-24: khyod de ltar yi dam la brtan pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-0: 'di lta bu'i chos 'dod pas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang @501b chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-1: thabs la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-6: rkang gis bya ba med kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-7: kho bo khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-9: khyod kyis dam pa slongs shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-11: khyod la dam pa ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-14: sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa bdag la stsol cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-17: yul 'di kho bo'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-18: yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-20: byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus smras pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-21: bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-22: lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-24: bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-26: bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:501b-27: bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa g-yo med par mkhyen ce na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-0: bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi bzhin du gyur cig @502a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-2: skad cig thang cig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-3: lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi bzhin du gnas par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-5: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin spobs pa med par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-8: kho mo'i khyim ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-9: kho mos pha ma las nor blangs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-10: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mchod par bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur sti bya ba sbyin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo de 'grogs nas de rang gi khyim ga la ba der dong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-13: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502a-29: rol mo'i cha byad mang po dag stsol cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-0: bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal ba'i g-yog mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang @502b lhan cig dgyer gsol /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-2: de'ang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-3: de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de su zhig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-7: rigs kyi bu de da ltar gang na 'dug /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-9: rigs kyi bu de da ltar 'o skol gyi sgo drung na mchis te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-11: lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-12: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma mchis pa las thar par bgyi bar 'tshal bas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-13: de chos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-15: de'i lus nyo bar su'ang ma byung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-16: de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mi dga' bar sems shing mchis te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-19: lus nyo ba ma rnyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-21: brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur te de la 'di skad du /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-23: khyed gang gi phyir lus 'tshong bar 'dod ces bgyis pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:502b-24: rtag tu ngu des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la'ang bkur stir bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-2: nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-3: de la rag las pas 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-4: chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro; ;zhes bgyis pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-5: brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-8: 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-12: rigs kyi bu des yi ma sad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-13: zhes smras nas de mtshon rnon po thogs te bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzugs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-14: brla'i sha btogs te rus pa gcog tu song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste rus pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-16: snyam nas de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-17: de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-18: mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-19: de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-21: 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-22: de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-23: bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-30: nga la nor gzhan ci'ang med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-32: bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503a-33: de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-0: chos 'dod @503b pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchod par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur sti bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-2: zhes mchi nas bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te; rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-3: des khyed la yon tan gyi rnam pa'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-5: de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-6: sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-7: 'di lta bu'i chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-9: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-10: rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam bgyid de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-12: 'di lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-13: shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-16: 'di ni; chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs su gtong na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-17: bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-18: ci'i phyir chos la mchod pa mi bgyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-19: 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam ci'i phyir mi gdab snyam nas rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-21: khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag ma byed cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:503b-22: khyod 'dod pa gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i nor mang po de dag khyod la sbyin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-0: bdag kyang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @504a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-1: chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-2: bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bgyi'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-3: gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag gis kyang thob par bgyi'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-6: yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal du gsol /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-7: bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi'o ////
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-9: bam po sum brgya gzhi pa ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-10: tha ma; de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-11: rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-13: gcig tu nges par bsam gyis mi khyab pa; 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-14: sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-16: de'i phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-18: bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags blta zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro yi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-20: de nas bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504a-21: bkur sti bya ba'i phyir chas te pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-0: dge ba'i phyogs gang gi'ang @504b bar chad mi bgyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-1: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya'ang rgyan gyis brgyan /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-2: bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-3: rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog kha dog sna tshogs thogs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-14: dngul gyi me tog dag thogs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-15: rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad bdag kyang thogs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-18: myang ba mang po mang du bskur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang shing rta gcig tu zhugs te bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas pha ma la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su dong ste mthar gyis song pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-20: blta na sdug pa las byas pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-21: rin po che sna bdun gyi ra ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-22: rta ba bas bdun yod pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-24: ta la'i phreng rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-26: zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-30: mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:504b-31: grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor bris pa bzhin du gtams pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-1: khri nyam mi nga ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-2: bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa lags par byas pa mthong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-3: de'i dbus kyi gzhi mod na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-5: 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos 'chad pa mthong ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-6: mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-7: bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-9: dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-10: de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-11: bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-13: snyam nas de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-14: tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-15: bu mo lnga brgya de dag dang mnyam du shing rta de las babs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bkod pa chad med pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505a-18: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-0: mu tig @505b gi dra bas g-yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-1: khang bu brtsegs pa de'i grva bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-2: de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-3: bdug spos kyi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir btags te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir aa ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis bdug par byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-6: khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-7: de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bee d'urya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-8: khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-10: bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-11: lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-12: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-13: lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-14: lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-15: lha'i dngul sil ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs pa de la 'thor /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-17: mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-18: lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:505b-19: mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-0: khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag @506a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-1: dang rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-2: tsandan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-5: lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-6: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-7: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-12: 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-13: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-14: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-16: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-20: yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506a-23: khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bee d'urya bzhu bas bris pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgya rim bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-0: kho bo cag gis @506b khyod la bstan par dka'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-2: bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas de dag gis me tog dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-3: me tog phreng gi chun po dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-15: dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-16: de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir shas shas kyis bzhag go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-25: ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-28: me tog phreng dang; byug pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:506b-36: dngul gyi me tog gis gtor /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-1: gtor; mngon par rab tu gtor to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-2: de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng na me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-4: dngul gyi me tog dag nam mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-6: gos rin po che de dag kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-8: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-11: rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa 'di 'dra na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507a-13: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-0: 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs @507b pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-2: bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par shog cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-5: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-6: thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa 'di bzhin du bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-7: thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-9: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:507b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la'ang bkur stir byas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi @508a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-1: rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-2: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-4: 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na sgra thos pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-6: shar phyogs su song shig dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-8: zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su mchis nas 'di snyam du bsams te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-9: bdag gis sgra de la ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-10: su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-11: snyam ste; des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-12: de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-14: gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te ji srid du mchi bar bgyi ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris so; ;snyam pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-16: de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508a-19: khyed 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-0: @508b grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de dag las bdag gis 'di thos nas ji ltar btams pa bzhin du shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-3: rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-4: mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pa dper na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-5: dge slong bsam gtan dang po la zhugs pa bzhin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-7: rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-8: de nyan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-9: bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-13: khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-15: 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-16: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-17: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:508b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-1: bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-3: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-6: thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-7: de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur snyam nas rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-9: khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag zhu na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-11: ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-12: bzhud pa 'tshal zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-13: bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-16: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509a-22: de bzhin nyid las ma g-yos so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-0: @509b de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-3: mi skye ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-4: mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-7: yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-8: yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de ni /
