K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-13: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni; de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-15: ji lta ba bzhin la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-16: ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-19: 'dod chags dang bral ba la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-20: 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-23: 'gog pa la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-24: 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni; de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-28: nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-31: chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-33: chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-35: de bzhin nyid gcig ste; rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-36: de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:509b-40: med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-3: mi nyi mas gdungs pas sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe smig rgyu g-yo ba mthong nas der chu btung ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-4: zhes de dang der rgyug na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-9: chu de shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-12: byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-15: smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-16: 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-18: mi nyi mas gdungs shing byas pa'i rang bzhin can; shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis smig rgyu mthong nas chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes skyed kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-20: rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-22: rigs kyi bu; de de bzhin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-24: de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-25: gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-26: sgrar mngon par zhen par byed pa de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par rtog go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-28: gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-30: shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can zhes bya ste; dper na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-31: mi de chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510a-34: gzugs kyi skur mi lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-5: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-9: sgyu ma sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-12: dpung pu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-18: skyes bu gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-28: de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-36: rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi gda'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-39: yang dag pa ma lags pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-44: de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-47: gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:510b-49: gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-0: @511a *// de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-1: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-2: 'khor ba 'gro ba drug por dong ba /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-10: gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o; ;zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-15: gang dag chos gang la'ang 'ong ba'am /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-18: 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-20: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa'am bzhud par mi rtog go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-22: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bu rab tu shes pa de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-23: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur ba ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511a-26: yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-4: rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-12: phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-13: sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-14: de dag kyang rgyu med par byung ba ma yin gyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-17: gzhi la rag las pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-19: rin po che de dag 'gag pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-20: rkyen de dag yod na; rin po che de dag rab tu 'byed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-22: rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-24: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa'ang gang nas kyang ma byon /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-25: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ma bzhud do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-27: sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-28: rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-29: sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-30: de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-33: sku mngon par 'grub pa'ang mi snang ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:511b-37: pi wang gi sgra byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-5: pi wang gi khog pa la brten /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-10: mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas pi wang de las sgra 'byung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-11: sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-16: mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-17: de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang sgrar grag la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-18: sgra de 'gags pa'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-21: dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-24: dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi rab tu dbye ba ma yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-25: rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-26: rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-28: gang nas kyang ma byon te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-29: rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du'ang mi bzhud de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-31: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512a-34: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-0: khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs @512b pa dang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-1: 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-3: thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-5: bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe sa g-yo ba chen po byung ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-6: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-13: bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing spa bkong bar gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-14: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtsva dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-16: nags tshal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'dud par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-17: dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor zhing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-18: me tog gi char dag kyang bab bo; ;lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-19: rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-22: mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:512b-23: khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-0: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa gang 'jig @513a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-1: tshogs la gnas pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-5: sa g-yos pa chen po byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-7: chos 'phags kyis smras pa; rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byin mi bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te kho bos bstan pas srog chags brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-9: srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-10: srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-12: rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-13: bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-15: bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas sems can 'di snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513a-16: bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-0: 'di nyid kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @513b byang chub la phyir the tshom mi bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-2: the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-4: de dga' ba dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun du nam mkha' la 'phags nas ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-5: bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o; ;snyam du sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-6: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la lha'i me tog manda ra ba dag byin te 'di skad du /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-8: me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-10: ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba yin te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-12: khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-14: gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir ji ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur bskal ba grangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:513b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin las me tog de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-0: mngon par rab tu gtor nas bdag gi lus kyis byang chub @514a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-3: deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-4: zham ring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-5: des bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-6: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-7: 'khor lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-9: bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-10: bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-11: khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-13: de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-14: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-16: khyed kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-17: kho bo la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang bu mo khyed kho bos blang ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-18: bu mo de dag gis smras pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-19: khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514a-20: khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la @514b sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-1: shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-5: shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-6: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-7: zhes bya ba byin te; rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-10: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-11: yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-13: chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-14: thabs la mkhas pa nyan nus te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-15: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-16: thabs la mkhas pa yongs su dris so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:514b-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-0: shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @515a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-1: chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu la byin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur nas de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-3: 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-10: chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-11: 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-16: thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-18: gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-19: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515a-20: ro la brkam pa ma skyes te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-0: gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam @515b ldang bar 'gyur /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-1: bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na; bdag gis phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyi /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-2: legs par byugs la me tog sna tshogs gtor te sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-3: thabs la mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-5: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i rjes su slob cing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-6: spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-7: bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra thos te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin las ldang ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-10: langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'jug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-11: zhes grag nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-12: dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:515b-14: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-0: de nas bu mo de dag gis @516a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-1: rang rang gi bla gos phud de stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sa phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-3: bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-5: mchod pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-7: bdag gi lus phug nas khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-11: 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-12: bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'di ci zhig bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-13: bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-15: nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis 'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516a-16: cir yang ma rung snyam mo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-0: de nas byang chub sems @516b dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus la kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu chag chag btab bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs der chag btab ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-2: gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad bya ba'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-3: bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-4: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-7: 'di ltar yi dam la brtan pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-8: 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-11: longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thar bar bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-14: snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:516b-17: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsandan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-0: lha'i tsandan gyi chu de'i dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa @517a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-1: phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris khyab bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-2: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so; ;rigs kyi bu /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-5: khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-7: chos yongs su tshol ba bla na med do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-9: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-11: chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-13: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-19: bdag gi me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-21: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517a-23: lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems @517b dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la'ang gtor cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-1: ces des de la lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba khal stong byin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-3: me tog kha cig gis ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-4: sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-5: me tog kha cig gis ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan pa ting ba la 'dug ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-8: 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-11: bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-14: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do; ;chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:517b-15: chos thams cad g-yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g-yo ba med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-1: cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-2: chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-3: chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rog gcig pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-4: chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-5: chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-6: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-7: nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-8: rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-9: ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-10: nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-11: gzugs mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-12: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-15: rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518a-16: sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-0: rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid @518b do; ;nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-1: rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-2: chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-3: chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-4: chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-5: chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-6: chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du reg par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-8: chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-9: chos thams cad g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-10: chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-11: chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-12: chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-13: chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-14: chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-15: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:518b-16: nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-1: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-2: ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-3: nam mkha'i rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-4: gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-8: rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-9: sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i gting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-12: rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-13: nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-14: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-15: chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-16: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-17: chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-18: chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-19: chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus de la sogs par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob par gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-22: chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519a-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus ting nge 'dzin gyis sgo 'bum phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-3: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-5: yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-8: da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos ston pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te tshul 'di nyid dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-11: yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-12: de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-13: thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-14: gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-15: skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skye ste /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-16: tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar gyur to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-17: des mi khyom pa thams cad ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-19: ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:519b-22: rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrubs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen @520a *//
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-1: pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-8: gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te me tog dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-28: khor yug tu mar ma'i phreng ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-29: mchod pa rnams pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bya /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-39: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-0: bcom ldan @520b 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-1: bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-2: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-5: khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-6: ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-7: yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim blo byas so //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-10: da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis phangs pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-12: gus par byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la'ang byas shig /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-14: ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-15: ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su gtad do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-16: rjes su yongs su gtad do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-20: de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-22: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:520b-26: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-3: khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-4: mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-9: gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-10: sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-11: dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-12: dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung na spyod par rig par bya'o //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-17: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-18: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-23: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-25: yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste; bdun cu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-26: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K02acip-k_lha_sa-025-001:521a-28: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o;;
